# <a name="empty-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="2e79e-102">Inbox kosong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-102">Empty inbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2e79e-103">**Inbox saya kosong**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-103">**My inbox is empty**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-104">Pengaya tertentu pada Firefox browser mungkin mencegah inbox loading.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-104">Certain add-ons in the Firefox browser might prevent your inbox from loading.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-105">Kunjungi Dukungan Firefox untuk mempelajari cara [menonaktifkan atau menghapus Pengaya](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-105">Visit Firefox support to learn how to [Disable or remove Add-ons](https://support.mozilla.org/kb/disable-or-remove-add-ons).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2e79e-106">**Saya ingin kosong inbox saya**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-106">**I want to empty my inbox**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2e79e-107">Jika Anda ingin untuk mengosongkan kotak masuk dan menghapus semua email Anda:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-107">If you want to empty your inbox and delete all your email:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-108">Pilih lingkaran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-108">Select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-109">berikutnya ke [kotak masuk](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) di bagian atas daftar pesan untuk memilih semua pesan Anda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-109">next to [Inbox](https://outlook.live.com/mail/inbox) at the top of your message list to select all your messages.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-110">Di bagian atas halaman, pilih **folder kosong** (atau **Terfokus kosong** / **kosong lain** jika terfokus Inbox diaktifkan).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-110">At the top of the page, select **Empty folder** (or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if Focused Inbox is turned on).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-111">Pilih **Hapus semua**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-111">Select **Delete all**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2e79e-112">Untuk membersihkan semua pesan yang dihapus, buka [folder Item dihapus](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) Anda dan pilih **folder kosong** > **Hapus semua**, kemudian pilih **memulihkan item yang dihapus dari folder ini** di bagian atas laman dan pilih **folder kosong** lagi .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-112">To purge all your deleted messages, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder** > **Delete all**, then select **Recover items deleted from this folder** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2e79e-113">Untuk informasi lebih lanjut, lihat [menghapus email di Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e79e-113">For more information, see [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)</span></span>
